name: search_arxiv
description: Retrieve academic papers from the ArXiv database based on a search query.

search_query.description: The search query string following ArXiv API syntax. Use field prefixes for specific fields (ti: for title, au: for author, abs: for abstract, cat: for category, etc.) and Boolean operators (AND, OR, NOT). Example: all:electron&start=6000&max_results=2000, or au:del_maestro+ANDNOT+ti:checkerboard
